20101208150826.000|20101208150827.667|CCO|ABOUT EVERYBODY THAT SHE WAS 
20101208150827.667|20101208150829.333|CCO|LEAVING BEHIND BUT FELT GOOD 
20101208150829.333|20101208150831.000|CCO|ABOUT WHAT SHE WAS, WHAT SHE WAS
